DOC.brief_summary: Prospective, randomized trial comparing surgical, functional and oncological outcomes between clamp and clamp-less robot assisted partial nephrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: CLamp vs Off Clamp Kidney During Partial Nephrectomy
DOC.criteria: normal coagulation trim pre operative Glomerular Filtration Rate (GFR) > 60 ml/min healty contralateral kidney low (46) or intermediate (710) RENAL score availability of Da Vinci Robotic System altered coagulation trim pre operative Glomerular Filtration Rate (GFR) < 60 ml/min anatomic or functional solitary kidney RENAL score >10
